mapper.select: select code from fasp_t_dicds where elementcode='AGENCY'
select count(*) from user_tables where table_name=#{tablename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: create table ${tablename} ( ADMDIV VARCHAR2(50) , GUID VARCHAR2(50) not null, ISLEAF NUMBER(1), ORGCODE VARCHAR2(32), LEVELNO NUMBER(1), REMARK VARCHAR2(500), CREATETIME VARCHAR2(17), AGENCYTYPE VARCHAR2(32), ORGSPEC VARCHAR2(32), FININTORG VARCHAR2(32), ZIP CHAR(6), VERSION NUMBER(9), TEL VARCHAR2(50), SUPERGUID VARCHAR2(50), INTORG VARCHAR2(50), FAX VARCHAR2(50), CODE VARCHAR2(50) not null, SRCGUID VARCHAR2(50), IND VARCHAR2(50), NAME VARCHAR2(200) not null, SUPDEP VARCHAR2(50), DESGUID VARCHAR2(32), ADDRESS VARCHAR2(500), SRCSCALE NUMBER(18,4), STARTTIME VARCHAR2(17), PINYIN VARCHAR2(200), FUNDSUP VARCHAR2(32), ALIAS VARCHAR2(100), ENDTIME VARCHAR2(17), AGENCYLEVEL VARCHAR2(50), STATUS CHAR(1), YEAR CHAR(4) not null, PROVINCE VARCHAR2(9) not null, DBVERSION TIMESTAMP(6), CANCELTIME VARCHAR2(17), ENABLE CHAR(1), PAYTYPEFLAG CHAR(1), SALARYTYPEFLAG CHAR(1), SPEACCTTYPEFLAG CHAR(1), GLTYPEFLAG CHAR(1), BGTTYPEFLAG CHAR(1), ISTOWN VARCHAR2(32), TOWNCODE VARCHAR2(200), DWSXBS VARCHAR2(50), FPCOL1 VARCHAR2(50), FPCOL2 VARCHAR2(50), FPCOL3 VARCHAR2(50), FPCOL4 VARCHAR2(200), FPCOL5 VARCHAR2(200), AAORDERNO NUMBER(9), LEADERNAME VARCHAR2(100), UNIFSOCCREDCODE VARCHAR2(32), ISCZAGENCY VARCHAR2(50) )
